content: **bag with heart** measurement 32 x 34 cm 12½ x 13 3/8 materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 350 g color no 11 burgundy and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 100 g color no 03 wine or drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio 100 g colour no 07 red drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm us 7 or crochet hook needed to obtain correct gauge ____________________________________________________ **bag with stripes** measurement 32 x 34 cm 12½ x 13 3/8 materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 350 g color no 11 burgundy and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 50 g color no 03 wine 50 g color no 16 orange 50 g color no 02 dark brown or drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio 50 g colour no 07 red 50 g colour no 06 coral 50 g colour no 05 beige drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm us 7 or crochet hook needed to obtain correct gauge
